review: I've watched four movies,When working it's great, but after the first two viewings, the screen locked. I called for assistance  and was told to unplug and restart which did work, but after the next movie, it locked again. I finally got a message about weak batteries, so I replaced them and it worked fine for another 2 or 3 movies. I tried again today and found the screen again locked. I again replaced the batteries and it now works. Basically I have to replace the batteries about every two weeks even though I may not use it for more than a few hours.
author: Gerald P.

review: After house sitting for my sister and enjoying her AppleTV, I came home and looked in to the Fire TV Stick. I had really enjoyed watching Netflix on a screen bigger than my laptop and not having to hook up my laptop to the TV via HDMI. Set up is very simple, but I can't say I'm very happy with it. It is amazing when it's working, but it seems like at least once an episode (I'm a Netflix binge watcher) it has to stop to load. Sometimes it does it up to five times an episode, ranging from 30 seconds to five minutes for it to start up again. Many times I just get fed up and go back to watching on my laptop. For how much it cost me, it is great. But I think I'd rather just spend a little bit more just for the comfort of knowing that I will be able to get through one episode of Psych without constant buffering.
